description:
Featuring awesome firebending powers and equippable swords, Zuko from Avatar: The Last Airbender joins Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2!

This pack features:
• Playable brawler Zuko
• Alternate Zuko costumes

Note:
Zuko and the content contained in this pack are also included in the Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 Season Pass (sold separately).

In order to use this downloadable content, you will need Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 (sold separately).
name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl 2 - Zuko Brawl Pack
